trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Set-WmiInstance
trans-unit.target: Set-wmiinstance

trans-unit.source: Set-WmiInstance
trans-unit.target: Set-wmiinstance

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Creates or updates an instance of an existing Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) class.
trans-unit.target: 创建或更新现有 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: class (Default)
trans-unit.target: 类 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: object
trans-unit.target: 对象

trans-unit.source: path
trans-unit.target: 路径

trans-unit.source: WQLQuery
trans-unit.target: WQLQuery

trans-unit.source: query
trans-unit.target: 查询

trans-unit.source: list
trans-unit.target: 列表

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Set-WmiInstance** cmdlet creates or updates an instance of an existing WMI class.
trans-unit.target: **Set-wmiinstance** cmdlet 创建或更新现有 WMI 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The created or updated instance is written to the WMI repository.
trans-unit.target: 创建或更新的实例将写入 WMI 存储库。

trans-unit.source: New CIM cmdlets, introduced Windows PowerShell 3.0, perform the same tasks as the WMI cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的新 CIM cmdlet 执行与 WMI cmdlet 相同的任务。

trans-unit.source: The CIM cmdlets comply with WS-Management (WSMan) standards and with the Common Information Model (CIM) standard, which enables the cmdlets to use the same techniques to manage Windows computers and those running other operating systems.
trans-unit.target: CIM cmdlet 符合 WS-Management (WSMan) 标准和通用信息模型 (CIM) 标准，从而使得这些 cmdlet 可以使用相同的技术来管理 Windows 计算机和运行其他操作系统的那些计算机。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using **Set-WmiInstance**, consider using the Set-CimInstancehttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227962 or New-CimInstancehttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227963 cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用 **Set-wmiinstance**, ，请考虑使用集 CimInstancehttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227962 或新建 CimInstancehttp://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=227963 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command sets the WMI logging level to 2.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 WMI 日志记录级别设置为 2。

trans-unit.source: The command passes the property to be set and the value (together considered a value pair) in the argument parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该命令通过 argument 参数传递要设置的属性和值（二者合称为值对）。

trans-unit.source: The parameter takes a hash table that is defined by the @{property = value} construction.
trans-unit.target: 此参数接受由 @{property = value} 结构定义的哈希表。

trans-unit.source: The class information that is returned reflects the new value.
trans-unit.target: 返回的类信息将反映出新值。

trans-unit.source: This command creates the testvar environment variable that has the value "testvalue".
trans-unit.target: 此命令创建值为“testvalue”的 testvar 环境变量。

trans-unit.source: It does this by creating a new instance of the Win32_Environment WMI class.
trans-unit.target: 它通过创建 Win32_Environment WMI 类的新实例来实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: Note that this operation requires appropriate credentials and that you may need to restart Windows PowerShell to see the new environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此操作需要适当的凭据，并且你可能需要重新启动 Windows PowerShell 才能查看新的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: This command sets the WMI logging level to 2.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将 WMI 日志记录级别设置为 2。

trans-unit.source: The command passes the property to be set and the value (together considered a value pair) in the argument parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该命令通过 argument 参数传递要设置的属性和值（二者合称为值对）。

trans-unit.source: The parameter takes a hash table that is defined by the @{property = value} construction.
trans-unit.target: 此参数接受由 @{property = value} 结构定义的哈希表。

trans-unit.source: The returned class information reflects the new value.
trans-unit.target: 返回的类信息将反映出新值。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Arguments
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the property to be changed and the new value for that property.
trans-unit.target: 指定要更改的属性的名称，以及该属性的新值。

trans-unit.source: The name and value must be in a name-value pair.
trans-unit.target: 名称和值必须为“名称-值”对。

trans-unit.source: The name-value pair is passed on the command-line as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 该“名称-值”对在命令行上以哈希表形式传递。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: -argument @{Setting1=1; Setting2=5; Setting3="test"}.
trans-unit.target: -argument @{Setting1=1; Setting2=5; Setting3="test"}。

trans-unit.source: -AsJob
trans-unit.target: -AsJob

trans-unit.source: Runs the command as a background job.
trans-unit.target: 将命令作为后台作业运行。

trans-unit.source: Use this parameter to run commands that take a long time to finish.
trans-unit.target: 使用此参数可运行需要较长时间才能完成的命令。

trans-unit.source: When you use the AsJob parameter, the command returns an object that represents the background job and then displays the command prompt.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AsJob 参数时，该命令将返回表示后台作业的对象，然后显示命令提示符。

trans-unit.source: You can continue to work in the session while the job finishes.
trans-unit.target: 当作业完成时，你可以继续在此会话中工作。

trans-unit.source: If Set-WmiObject is used against a remote computer, the job is created on the local computer, and the results from remote computers are automatically returned to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Set-WmiObject 用于远程计算机，则作业在本地计算机上创建，并且来自远程计算机的结果将自动返回本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: To manage the job, use the cmdlets that contain the Job noun (the Job cmdlets).
trans-unit.target: 若要管理作业，请使用包含 Job 名词的 cmdlet (Job cmdlet)。

trans-unit.source: To get the job results, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取作业结果，请使用 Receive-Job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Note: To use this parameter with remote computers, the local and remote computers must be configured for remoting.
trans-unit.target: 注意：若要将此参数用于远程计算机，必须为本地和远程计算机配置远程处理。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you must start Windows PowerShell by using the "Run as administrator" option in Windows Vista and later versions of Windows,.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在 Windows Vista 和更高版本的 Windows 中，必须使用“以管理员身份运行”选项启动 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Remote_Requirements.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Remote_Requirements。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows PowerShell background jobs, see about_Jobs and about_Remote_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Windows PowerShell 后台作业的详细信息，请参阅 about_Jobs 和 about_Remote_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: -Authentication
trans-unit.target: 身份验证

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication level to be used with the WMI connection.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于 WMI 连接的身份验证级别。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 有效值包括：

trans-unit.source: -1: Unchanged
trans-unit.target: -1：Unchanged

trans-unit.source: 0: Default
trans-unit.target: 0：Default

trans-unit.source: 1: None (No authentication in performed.)
trans-unit.target: 1：None（不执行身份验证。）

trans-unit.source: 2: Connect (Authentication is performed only when the client establishes a relationship with the application.)
trans-unit.target: 2：Connect（仅当客户端与应用程序建立了关系时才执行身份验证。）

trans-unit.source: 3: Call (Authentication is performed only at the beginning of each call when the application receives the request.)
trans-unit.target: 3：Call（应用程序收到请求时只在每次调用的开始执行身份验证。）

trans-unit.source: 4: Packet (Authentication is performed on all the data that is received from the client.)
trans-unit.target: 4：Packet（对从客户端收到的所有数据执行身份验证。）

trans-unit.source: 5: PacketIntegrity (All the data that is transferred between the client and the application is authenticated and verified.)
trans-unit.target: 5：PacketIntegrity（所有在客户端和应用程序之间传送的数据都经过身份验证和验证。）

trans-unit.source: 6: PacketPrivacy (The properties of the other authentication levels are used, and all the data is encrypted.)
trans-unit.target: 6：PacketPrivacy（使用其他身份验证等级的属性，并且所有数据都加密。）

trans-unit.source: -Authority
trans-unit.target: 的颁发机构

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authority to use to authenticate the WMI connection.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于对 WMI 连接进行身份验证的授权机构。

trans-unit.source: You can specify standard NTLM or Kerberos authentication.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定标准 NTLM 或 Kerberos 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: To use NTLM, set the authority setting to ntlmdomain:\<DomainName\>, where \<DomainName\> identifies a valid NTLM domain name.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 NTLM，将颁发机构设置为 ntlmdomain:\<DomainName\>, ，其中 \<DomainName\> 标识有效的 NTLM 域名。

trans-unit.source: To use Kerberos, specify kerberos:\<DomainName\>\\\<ServerName\>".
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 Kerberos，请指定 kerberos:\<DomainName\>\\\<ServerName\>"。

trans-unit.source: You cannot include the authority setting when you connect to the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 连接到本地计算机时不能包含授权机构设置。

trans-unit.source: -Class
trans-unit.target: 类

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of a WMI class.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WMI 类的名称。

trans-unit.source: -ComputerName
trans-unit.target: -ComputerName

trans-unit.source: Runs the command on the specified computers.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的计算机上运行该命令。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: Type the NetBIOS name, an IP address, or a fully qualified domain name of one or more computers.
trans-unit.target: 键入一台或多台计算机的 NetBIOS 名称、IP 地址或完全限定的域名。

trans-unit.source: To specify the local computer, type the computer name, a dot (.), or "localhost".
trans-unit.target: 若要指定本地计算机，请键入该计算机名称、句点 (.) 或“localhost”。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not rely on Windows PowerShell remoting.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不依赖于 Windows PowerShell 远程处理。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ComputerName parameter even if your computer is not configured to run remote commands.
trans-unit.target: 即使你的计算机未配置为运行远程命令，你也可以使用 ComputerName 参数。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01", "Domain01\User01", or User@Contoso.com.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如“User01”、“Domain01\User01”或 User@Contoso.com。

trans-unit.source: Or, enter a PSCredential object, such as an object that is returned by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 或者，输入 PSCredential 对象，例如 Get-Credential cmdlet 返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名时，将会提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: -EnableAllPrivileges
trans-unit.target: -EnableAllPrivileges

trans-unit.source: Enables all the privileges of the current user before the command makes the WMI call .
trans-unit.target: 在该命令进行 WMI 调用之前，请使当前用户的所有权限。

trans-unit.source: -Impersonation
trans-unit.target: 模拟

trans-unit.source: Specifies the impersonation level to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的模拟级别。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 有效值包括：

trans-unit.source: 0: Default (Reads the local registry for the default impersonation level, which is usually set to "3: Impersonate".)
trans-unit.target: 0：Default（读取本地注册表的默认模拟级别，通常设置为“3：模拟”。）

trans-unit.source: 1: Anonymous (Hides the credentials of the caller.)
trans-unit.target: 1：Anonymous（隐藏调用方的凭据。）

trans-unit.source: 2: Identify (Allows objects to query the credentials of the caller.)
trans-unit.target: 2：Identify（允许对象查询调用方的凭据。）

trans-unit.source: 3: Impersonate (Allows objects to use the credentials of the caller.)
trans-unit.target: 3：Impersonate（允许对象使用调用方的凭据。）

trans-unit.source: 4: Delegate (Allows objects to permit other objects to use the credentials of the caller.)
trans-unit.target: 4：Delegate（允许对象允许其他对象使用调用方的凭据。）

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies a ManagementObject object to use as input.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用作输入的 ManagementObject 对象。

trans-unit.source: When this parameter is used, all other parameters ,except the Arguments parameter, are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此参数，则忽略 Arguments 参数之外的所有其他参数。

trans-unit.source: -Locale
trans-unit.target: 区域设置

trans-unit.source: Specifies the preferred locale for WMI objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定 WMI 对象的首选区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The Locale parameter is specified in an array in the MS_\<LCID\> format in the preferred order.
trans-unit.target: Ms_ 数组中指定的区域设置参数\<LCID\> 按首选顺序的格式。

trans-unit.source: -Namespace
trans-unit.target: -Namespace

trans-unit.source: When used with the Class parameter, this parameter specifies the WMI repository namespace where the referenced WMI class is located.
trans-unit.target: 当此参数与 Class 参数一起使用时，它将指定引用的 WMI 类所在的 WMI 存储库命名空间。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies a WMI object path to the instance that you want to create or update.
trans-unit.target: 指定要创建或更新的实例的 WMI 对象路径。

trans-unit.source: -PutType
trans-unit.target: -PutType

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the WMI instance should be created or updated.
trans-unit.target: 指示应创建还是更新 WMI 实例。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 有效值包括：

trans-unit.source: UpdateOnly: Updates an existing WMI instance.
trans-unit.target: UpdateOnly：更新现有 WMI 实例。

trans-unit.source: CreateOnly: Creates a new WMI instance.
trans-unit.target: CreateOnly：创建新的 WMI 实例。

trans-unit.source: UpdateOrCreate: Updates the WMI instance if it exists or creates a new instance if an instance does not exist.
trans-unit.target: UpdateOrCreate：如果 WMI 实例存在，则更新该实例；如果实例不存在，则创建一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: -ThrottleLimit
trans-unit.target: -ThrottleLimit

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to specify a throttling value for the number of WMI operations that can be executed simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 允许用户为可同时执行的 WMI 操作数目指定一个限制值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used together with the AsJob parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数与 AsJob 参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The throttle limit applies only to the current command, not to the session or to the computer.
trans-unit.target: 节流限制仅适用于当前命令，而不适用于会话或计算机。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not accept input.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不接受输入。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不产生输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
